messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:Paranoia
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry, but it doesn t meet the definition of paranoia.  No delusions, it happens on this list on a routine basis. Lynda ... From:  To:
messages.messageBody:
Sorry, but it doesn't meet the definition of paranoia. No delusions, it
happens on this list on a routine basis.

Lynda
----- Original Message -----
From: <lite2yu@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, November 16, 2001 11:39 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:Paranoia


> In a message dated 11/16/2001 1:18:18 PM Eastern Standard Time,
> Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
>
> > Dan,
> > I understand your frustration with what has been said and trust me
> > when I say, they will only keep pushing your buttons and inciting
> > you, then blast you when you respond.
> >
> >
>
> This is EXACTLY what I mean by paranoia.
>
>
>
